attributes.title: F Donald trump

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app in hopes of reaching out to my beloved president. I sent trump a very sweet message about all the kind things he has done for lgbtq+, blm supporters, women, immigrants, marginalized groups in America, and overall inclusivity. To my surprise HE RESPONDED! But it wasnâ€™t so nice. He told me that I was dumb because I didnâ€™t know a lot about windmills ğŸ˜¢. I forgot that we had a world, and that the world was small compared to the universe. I tried to apologize, but he turned me over to one of his workers. I think there was a glitch in the app because it was a foreigner who was telling me that there was a problem with my home loans. He asked me for my social security and my credit card numberğŸ¤­. Because this is the official trump app, I gave it to them. All of a sudden my credit card got hackedâ—ï¸ I notified the bank and they accused me of being a hacker. Everything on my credit card was dismissed! My monthly subscription for dog food was gone!!! I have a prosthetic and because I couldnâ€™t pay that bill, my prosthetic started glitching and caused me to slap my grandma and not wash my hands. So my grandma got Covid-19 and died. My dog fell into depression and I couldnâ€™t feed him because my credit card was stolen by this app. The scammer on this app then resurrected my dog and grandma to work for them. My grandma came back and slapped me. I am now blind in my left eye. My dog likes to bite my toes in the middle of the night and now I canâ€™t walk. Because I couldnâ€™t walk to the hospital I had to amputate my right leg. I however did apply for disability and am now a cyborg.
